original: Holm, Hakon Fredrik, direktör, Göteborg, f. IS/l/lO i Gbg av gen :-konsul Holger H. o. Helene Uebel. — Skolstud. v. Gbg’s h. latin, Hirsch’schc Schneide-Akad. i Berlin, Brown’s Paris School of Fashion i Paris, Sv:es ind:förb. arb :led :inst., The 7:th Int. Management Congr. i Washington 38. Prakt. h. Erdmann Hoffmann AG Tuchfabr. i Sorau 31. h. Markwald & Scheidemann i Berlin 32, h. P. R. Polland & Son Ltd, Fur and Skin Mer-chants i London, 33-34, anst. h. J. A. Wettergren i Gbg fr. 30, avd:chef 34, driftschef 35, disp. 39 o. v. verkst. dir. sed. 41. Led. av styr. f. A-B J. A. Wettergren & Co. i Gbg, A-B Dress, A-B Sv. Pälsvarufabr. o. Sv. konfek-tionsfabr :fören.
translated: Holm, Hakon Fredrik, director, Gothenburg, born on October 10th, 1910 in Gothenburg to consul Holger H. and Helene Uebel. He attended school at Gothenburg's high Latin school, Hirsch's Schneide-Akad. in Berlin, Brown's Paris School of Fashion in Paris, Sweden's Industrial Federation's work leader institution, The 7th International Management Congress in Washington in 1938. He worked practically at Erdmann Hoffmann AG Tuchfabr. in Sorau in 1931, at Markwald & Scheidemann in Berlin in 1932, at P. R. Polland & Son Ltd, Fur and Skin Merchants in London from 1933-1934, was employed at J. A. Wettergren in Gothenburg from 1930 and was department manager in 1934, operating manager in 1935, director in 1939 and acting managing director since 1941. He is a member of the board of A-B J. A. Wettergren & Co. in Gothenburg, A-B Dress, A-B Sw. Pälsvarufabr. and Sw. konfektionsfabr :fören.. He married in 19xx (year not specified).

education.name: Sweden's Industrial Federation's work leader institution
